author: gdamour
msg: Adds an utility class to inject the Referenceable interface to an object.

author: gdamour
msg: Indicates what is the behavior of an EndPoint proxy when it is
invoked after having released by its Node.

author: gdamour
msg: Adds operations to define a ReplacerResolver as online or offline.
This can be used to discard a ReplacerResolver from its chain.

author: gdamour
msg: Adds a method returning all the registered Nodes of the topology.
